name: dumbbudget
tagline: A simple self-hosted budgeting app for tracking income and expenses
description: DumbBudget is a simple budgeting and expense tracker built to be self-hosted. It lets users define categories, record transactions, and review monthly summaries through a clean, no-frills web dashboard.

features.title: Category Management
features.description: Create custom spending categories to organize expenses according to your budget structure

features.title: Transaction Logging
features.description: Record income and expenses with date, amount, and category for accurate financial tracking

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Manage finances through a straightforward dashboard without complex features or navigation

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Store all financial information on your own server without sharing with external services

features.title: REST API
features.description: Add transactions rapidly with minimal fields to capture expenses as they occur

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download transaction history and summaries for tax preparation or external analysis
